Address: 45 Grange Park Drive Waurn Ponds VIC 3216
Description:
MOTIVATED SELLER, exceptional value.
Located in the exclusive Grange Park Estate, this 404m2 allotment is ready and waiting for the lucky purchaser to build their dream home. Surrounded by luxurious and opulent homes, this slice of real estate is located in one of the most tightly held estates in the region. Ideally located within easy reach of schools, Deakin University, Waurn Ponds Shopping Center, Epworth hospital and the Ring Road making the trip to the CBD, Melbourne or the Surfcoast a simple one. Public transport is a breeze, with the Waurn Ponds Train Station just up a short distance away. Dont miss this chance to build on one of the last untouched blocks in the well-established estate.
Insights: 45 Grange Park Drive, Waurn Ponds VIC 3216 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Terrific Family Living An Instant From Schools!
This property is under offer subject to a special condition that still needs to be satisfied and so, therefore, we will continue to open this home until the contract is unconditional.
If you are interested in this property you are welcome to attend one of our scheduled openings.
CURRENT BID $575,000 - 3 QUALIFIED BIDDERS. The property has met the reserve.
Boasting a spacious layout, superb entertaining options, and ample off-street parking, this home ticks every box for terrific family living!
When it comes to convenient locations, this one has it all! Grovedale West P.S. and Grovedale College are within easy walking distance for families, along with public transport and the Burdoo Recreation Reserve. The Grovedale Community Hub is moments away, while the Heyers Road shops include an IGA and Medical Centre. The Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre is wonderfully close by, while the Waurn Ponds Train Station is within close reach for Melbourne commuters.
A generous entry welcomes you into the home, while the interiors exude character with raked timber ceilings and exposed brick walls. Graced with a gas log fireplace, the front living room entices you to sit back and relax. The family room creates a generous retreat for the whole family to enjoy, while the kitchen/dining zone flows onto the outdoor entertaining area. Complete with a built-in BBQ, this spacious outdoor zone is perfect for casual gatherings or fun-filled parties with loved ones! The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry and appliances (dishwasher, wall oven, 900mm gas cooktop, 900mm rangehood).
Zoned to the rear of the home, the Master Bedroom features built-in robes and an en suite. Three additional bedrooms boast built-in robes, while the updated main bathroom will delight with a spa bath. The separate toilet and large laundry with storage complete the layout. Modcons include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, three split-system air conditioners, and ducted vacuum. The secure backyard is home to a garden shed, while the lock-up carport provides secure parking for two vehicles. With the carport flowing through to the outdoor entertainment zone and backyard, there is also the potential for additional vehicle storage making this an ideal choice for those looking to store caravans, boats, or trailers.
With so much to offer, youll need to act swiftly to secure this superb family lifestyle!
Internal area
228m²
Insights: 11 EUROKA COURT, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 77 other 4 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Charming red brick Belmont classic.
Absolutely perfect for the lifestyle location seeking first home buyer or young family looking for great accommodation within walking distance to major services. Presented in outstanding original condition this is the key Belmont opportunity you have been looking for.
Solid as a rock and consisting of three generous bedrooms, light filled fourth external bedroom with its own living area, lounge, kitchen and meals area plus sunroom. Features include gas heating, double lockup garage, rear lane access all positioned on a large allotment of approx. 687sqm with a north facing rear yard.
Well positioned within easy distance to High Street Shopping, Oberon Primary School, Belmont High School, High Street shopping, public transport and only a short hop to Waurn Ponds shopping, Aquatic Centre, Deakin University, the Surf Coast and the Ring Road making day to day living a breeze.

Description:
Incredible Value - Owner says sell!
Fall in love with this Prime located townhouse set on the river in Highton - break into this highly sought after blue chip location. This stylishly updated 3 bedroom townhouse features a North facing balcony with views over the river. The large open modern kitchen comes equipped with stainless steel appliances and plentiful bench space and storage. The kitchen and living room are open plan with stunning north facing views. The townhouse features 3 good sized bedrooms master with ENS, a 2nd living room and study/bedroom located downstairs with a seperate updated modern bathroom and laundry. There's also a SLUG, 2 x S/S units and plenty of space throughout, this is one not to be missed.
Situated in a quiet pocket of Highton, merely metres from the Barwon River and walking tracks. Close to the Highton Village, Deakin Uni and CBD. Inspection a Must!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Address: 1 East View Terrace Jan Juc VIC 3228
Description:
Beautiful open views on East View
Youll love:
· A choice of living zones; by the cosy wood fire in the sunken lounge, or upstairs in the open living room with adjoining balcony.
· The feeling of privacy the home isnt overlooked and is elevated and perfectly oriented to capture sunshine and beautiful ocean views.
· A huge kitchen with dishwasher, built-in pantry and loads of bench space.
· Watching the sunrise from the master bedroom, complete with ensuite and walk-in robe.
Plus:
· Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes located on the same level as the main bathroom.
· The multi-level design, providing character and interest and oozing an eclectic vibe.
· Lovingly enjoyed, the home provides a relaxed feel and also features air-conditioning in two bedrooms, double garage, expansive decking downstairs and a brand new external paint job.

Address: 1721 Barwon Heads Road Barwon Heads VIC 3227
Description:
98 Acres On The Edge Of Barwon Heads!
The Feel:
The best of both worlds is hard to find, but here we have it! Approximately 98 hectares of fertile farmland, within minutes of Barwon Heads. A substantial four bedroom family home with amazing northern vistas over to the Wallington hills. Perfect for hobby farm enthusiasts or those looking for the ultimate family dream lifestyle. With surrounding self sufficiency capabilities and just moments from pristine local beaches - your perfectly balanced lifestyle starts here - act quickly!
The Facts:
-Solid four bedroom family home
-Two large living areas and study
-Large double garage with attic storage
-Versatile guest wing with studio size bedroom/living, kitchenette and en suite
-Solar heated in ground pool with spa
-Pool house
-Approximately 98 acres approx.
-Large northern rear elevation and flat landscape
-Fertile land ideal for a multitude of uses
-Privatised by established trees across boundaries
-Complete protection from cool southerly winds
-Extremely private from the street
-Separate, secure paddocks, ideal for hobby farming
-Opportunity for an organic, semi sustainable lifestyle
-Minutes from the Barwon Heads village centre
-A short distance to the beautiful Barwon River
-Enjoying close proximity to world class surf beaches
-Public transport and all practical facilities close by
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. It is derived from sources believed to be accurate and current as at the date of publication and as such Bellarine Property simply pass this information on. Use of such material is at your sole risk. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information

Description:
Resort style living, family entertainer.
In what is becoming one of Geelong's most sought after locations, offered to you is a rare opportunity to secure a delightful residence abundant in character to enjoy from day one. Ideal for first home buyers, families or the savvy investor seeking massive growth. Positioned within walking distance to the Barwon River Precinct and High Street Shopping Hub, there is no better position for those seeking a convenient carefree lifestyle.
Presented to perfection and offering light filled accommodation consisting of three bedrooms, two bathrooms, open plan living, kitchen with WIP and meals area. Flowing through to a second lounge room and dining room which leads out to the backyard with a solar heated swimming pool and outdoor area perfect for entertaining all year round whilst surrounded by a low maintenance manicured garden. The property offers plenty of off street parking as well as a single car garage with work shop and single carport. Features include gas log fire, wood fire, 900mm oven, dishwasher, two split systems, solar panels and has recently been repainted inside and out.
Well positioned on approx. 696 m2 within easy distance to great primary and secondary schools, High Street shopping, public transport, Waurn Ponds shopping, Aquatic Centre and the Ring Road making day to day living a breeze. Major investment in the area, including the ever expanding Deakin University and the Epworth Hospital underpins your investment and ensures that this is lifestyle central!

Description:
Modern, Sleek and Brand New!
Thoughtfully designed with excellent quality, and stress free living in mind. Modern, yet neutral finishes throughout in a secure setting designed for an easy lifestyle and effortless entertaining.
Large open living, dining and kitchen featuring Bosch stainless steel appliances. Large glass sliding doors, north facing light and seamlessly connect the main living with a large alfresco.
Two large bedrooms, master provides dual access to the central bathroom. Bathroom has been finished immaculately with quality tiles, high-quality tapware and cabintery and a timeless style that exudes luxury and elegance.
Central ducted heating and cooling, fully functional security system and soaring 9ft ceilings, single remote garage and generous storage options further contribute to the fantastic functionality, security and comfort this quality home offers.

Description:
Large modern home in great location.
*** PRIVATE INSPECTIONS ONLY ***
Positioned conveniently in a well regarded location, this modern home is 4 years young and comprises a versatile floorplan, perfect for a growing family or long term investment.
Don't want to drive? Then the Waurn Ponds railway station is literally a short walk away for that convenient commute option to Melbourne and the property is also ideally located close to local schools, Deakin University, Leisurelink sports facility, Epworth Hospital, the action packed Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre and the Ring Road taking you to Melbourne or Torquay without the traffic lights and delays!
The home offers 9 foot ceilings, 4 bedrooms, 2 living rooms, double garage, alfresco and low maintenance landscapes. The master enjoys walk-in robe and large en-suite. Bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 have BIRs and are serviced by a central family bathroom and separate toilet. The formal lounge flows through to the hub of the home offering a modern kitchen with Caesar stone benchtop and stainless-steel appliances including 900mm electric oven/gas cook top and range hood to suit any budding chef. Additionally, the kitchen offers a massive walk in pantry that you will find hard to fill.
Features that you will love include ducted heating, reverse cycle air conditioning, alfresco dining, DLUG with remote and more. With nearby wineries, Surf Coast 10 minutes and CBD 15 minutes away, the options for lifestyle are endless.
Don't miss out and call Dion on 0424 940 629 for your opportunity today!
Insights: 153 Rossack Drive, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 77 other 4 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Position perfect, immaculate condition.
Presented to perfection and ready for a new owner seeking maximum convenience in this peaceful locale. Ideal for first home buyers, families seeking quality education within walking distance or the savvy investor seeking massive growth. With a sensational outlook from the property and in close proximity to walking tracks along the creek this is a lifestyle location for now and well into the future.
This stunning family home consists of three bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, central bathroom located for ease of day to day living for the remaining two bedrooms, formal lounge room and dining room, open plan living, kitchen and meals area, leading you to the outdoor entertaining area. Rounding out this sensational offering is the well maintained gardens throughout offering plenty of off street parking and room for the kids to play. Features include double car garage with rear roller door, split system, gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher, ceiling fans and a garden shed.
Grovedale is commonly noted as one of the most conveniently located suburbs of Geelong complimented by the ever expanding Waurn Ponds Shopping Plaza, world class Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, multiple schools, state of the art sporting facilities and easily connecting to Melbourne Via Waurn Ponds and Marshall train stations or the Ring Road (M1) taking you to the CBD in an hour. Walking distance to the Torquay Road shopping strip and close proximity to bus stops. This is certainly a great opportunity not to be missed. Book your inspection here today!!

Description:
BARGAIN BUYING! - Plans Available
Urgent sale required...now priced below what the owner paid for it 2 years ago!!
Titled and ready to build your dream home on, this north facing generous 660m2 (approx) allotment secures a bright future being positioned close to Barrabool Hills Shopping Plaza, Epworth Hospital, quality schools, Deakin University, Leisurelink Aquatic Centre and the M1 taking you to Melbourne in under an hour.
Weekend activity awaits with the Barwon River and Buckley Falls walking tracks nearby, or venture a little further out to the world famous Surf Coast or perhaps the Geelong CBD and stunning waterfront. Either way this is a highly convenient location with all of Geelong's premium amenities at arm's reach. Seize on this fantastic opportunity today!

Description:
Danish inspired excellence.
Inspired by Modernist Danish Summer houses, this custom built home by award winning builder 'Homes with Integrity' will surely impress with its style, elegant design and high quality fixtures.
The Danish theme extends inside this split level home as you are met with a feature terrazzo Palladian entry floor complimented with engineered oak flooring to dine, kitchen and family room and wool carpets though out the remainder of the home.
Living spaces extend across the length of the property with all living spaces designed to take advantage of the uninterrupted views across the Fyansford plains to the You Yangs in the distance though oversized double glazed widows. Living room leads out onto elevated deck prefect for entertaining.
Stylish kitchen is an entertainer's delight with a central island which includes induction cook top and pyrolytic oven facing an oversized picture window taking further advantage of the expansive views. Kitchen also features stone bench tops, large pantry with appliance bench and fully integrated dish washer and fridge.
Private master bedroom continues to enjoy the unobstructed views and features custom made designer lighting, ample storage and an elegant ensuite. Ensuite features in situ tiled shower bases, frameless glass, stone bench tops with under mount basins, accented with European feature tiles. Main bathroom shares same features along with a generous free standing bath and separate toilet.
There are also an additional 2 bedrooms with celling fans and built in robes. Home is also serviced by a fully fitted European laundry and DLUG. Additional features include feature split system air conditioning, custom made feature lighting, European architectural hardware and so much more.
All this located within minutes from the Barrabool Hills Shopping Plaza, a short drive to Highton Village, local schools and Ring Road for commuters and surf coast lovers. This home really needs to be seen to be appreciate for the quality of the finish. Book your inspection today.
Insights: 11 Northbridge Road, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Live Your Best Life
Set on a generous 851sqm block and providing flexibility in spades, this attractive custom built Le Maistre home hosts sophisticated family living with ease.
An innovative and exciting design, spacious open-plan living and clean modern lines are stand out trademarks. The open plan design perfectly incorporates indoor and outdoor living and the pop up ceilings with highlight windows in both living rooms flood the home with natural light.
What YOU"LL LOVE:
- Freshly painted inside and out
- Brand new carpet throughout
- Step up living areas
- Walk in pantry
- Stainless steel appliances - double oven and 900mm gas cook top
- Stone kitchen bench tops
- Bathrooms tiled to ceilings
- Gas log fireplace, ducted heating and split system heating/cooling
- Private enclosed deck and courtyard off the living area
- Sunny rooftop deck
- Ducted vacuum
- Well established orchard
- Water tank
What the VENDOR LOVES:
We love how bright the house is and the layout of our home. We can easily host a party in the living areas without disturbing the bedrooms and we love admiring the sunset on the rooftop deck. The location is perfect, close to the Sands Health Club, beach and the street is extremely quiet with amazing neighbours.

Description:
OPEN CANCELLED - Complete family living in upheld locale.
Located within just minutes of the renowned Highton Village, quality schooling and Waurn Ponds shopping mecca. Walking distance of the Tim Hill Reserve, tennis courts and easy access to the Ring Road, Epworth Hospital and Deakin University, all ensuring a seamless daily commute. This excellent example of a safe and secure family property boasts a 933sqm (approx.) allotment with views across Highton and beyond. This functional property features undercover outdoor entertaining surrounded by two dining areas, two separate living spaces and open plan kitchen overlooking an expansive back yard; perfect for parents to keep an eye on children during play time outside.
The four large bedrooms provide plenty of room for growing families. The master with walk-in-robe and ensuite is positioned to the front of the property alongside the second bedroom perfect for nursery or home office that everyone is after.
The sunken lounge with gorgeous raked ceilings invites guests to relax in comfort and, combined with the open plan living/kitchen featuring polished timber floorboards, offers that much needed second living space for families. Featuring multiple storage options, ducted vacuum, ducted heating, air conditioning split system, plus storage/workshop in the double garage with a wide driveway offering extensive off street parking. Situated in a quiet leafy court in one of Wandana Heights' most desirable and convenient pockets, this home is sure to impress a range of buyers seeking value.

Description:
Calling All FHBs, Investors & Familes!
Ideally positioned in a peaceful pocket of Grovedale, this cherished home is the perfect choice for first homebuyers, investors, or growing families!
This family-friendly location will leave you wanting nothing. The Peter Street shops are a short stroll away, along with public transport and the Grovedale Recreation Reserve. Families will love that a selection of schools are within easy reach, including Nazareth Catholic P.S, Grovedale West P.S. and Grovedale College. The Surf Coast Highway shops are moments away, while the nearby Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre provides an abundance of shopping and dining options. Close access to Marshall Train Station is ideal for Melbourne commuters.
Still in original condition, the interiors exude character with raked timber ceilings and an exposed brick wall. The spacious lounge welcomes you into the home while flowing through to the kitchen/dining/living zone. The living zones have been perfectly positioned to maximise the northern light, with a north-facing highlight window making a statement above the kitchen. The kitchen is equipped with a built-in pantry, wall oven, and 900mm electric cooktop. Lined with leafy gardens, the north-facing alfresco inspires casual outdoor living.
Zoned to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom, while the laundry and separate toilet complete the functional layout. Two split-system air conditioners, a wall heater, and ceiling fans keep you comfortable in all seasons. Home to established trees and two garden sheds, the secure backyard creates a spacious retreat for children. The enclosed double lock-up carport provides secure parking.
Whether you're dreaming of owning your own home, looking for a terrific investment opportunity, or simply looking for a great home to raise your family, this is the one for you! Inspect ASAP!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Quality and Comfort From Top to Bottom
This sensational 3 bedroom + study townhouse with an imposing street presence will impress the most astute purchaser. Offering an exclusive lifestyle with large open plan living opening onto a Nth facing balcony with stunning views. A bright & spacious kitchen complete with stone bench tops, dishwasher and walk in pantry. Master bedroom features his and hers WIRs and ensuite, while both other bedrooms include BIRs and are serviced by the central bathroom, plus a powder room upstairs to service guests.
Features include:
- Ducted heating
- Split system A/C
- Hardwood floors
- Alarm
- Water tank
- Remote DLUG
- Under stairs storage
With the Barrabool Hills shops just down the road and easy access to the Geelong ring road for trips down the coast or heading to Melbourne. This property offers a low maintenance lifestyle leaving you time to enjoy the views.
Insights: 3 Swanbourne Avenue, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Hidden amongst trees & only metres to the reserve!
Youll love:
This classic home sitting on a beautiful, tree-filled block is right next to Bob Pettit Reserve with the ever-popular Jan Juc shops & clifftop trails only a few hundred metres away
A cosy built-in fireplace, slate floor tiles & a leafy outlook create a wonderful earthy feel inside the home, that is also complemented by the pitched ceiling above the main lounge area
The partially covered deck off the large kitchen/meals & living area is pretty special too, and has a gas fitting for the BBQ!
Plus:
The kitchen includes a gas cooktop/oven, a dishwasher and plenty of bench & pantry space.
Theres 3 good-sized bedrooms with ceiling fans (2 with BIRs), plus a neat & tidy bathroom with a corner spa bath.
Excellent natural lighting & ducted central heating throughout, with additional ceiling fans above the indoor & outdoor living areas.
The property also has a large lockable shed with a hot & cold shower outside, in addition to off-street parking for 2 cars.
Insights: 20 Alexandra Ave, Jan Juc VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Jan Juc have recently been sold.

Description:
SOLID START PROPERTY OR SAVVY INVESTMENT
This well presented 2 bed, 1 bath, 1 car townhouse, set on its own title in a well-established quiet Leopold pocket would suit an array of buyers, whether you're looking for a fabulous first home, neat downsizer property or savvy investment with a potential rent of $330pw approx.
Set on approx. 240m2 in a quiet Leopold pocket with nearby parklands and being only a stones throw to Leopold school and shops, this neatly presented 2 bedroom townhouse in a modern colour palette offers compact modern living with security and side gate access to your carport with double 3mt lockable gates.
Comprising of secure neat front garden with privacy tinted windows, you step foot into the large modern open plan' living room equipped with Fujitsu Inverter Reverse cycle split system for all year round comfort.
The spacious kitchen offers ample bench space, 4 burner gas cooktop and electric oven, modern tiled splash back and has room for a small dining setting.
Down the hall you will find 2 carpeted bedrooms, main room with BIR, modern ceiling fan, block out blinds and a neat front garden outlook. The central bathroom offers corner shower, sunken bath, modern vanity and heat lamps for those chilly mornings.
Outside offers multiple courtyard spaces, all zoned, making it ideal for pets. The back courtyard offers undercover pergola and high privacy fencing ideal for entertaining. The front courtyard is pretty as a postcard with evergreen lawn and established plants.
This well presented first start property is ideally located in growing Leopold, close to Shopping Village, Bunnings, nearby schools and parks, plus 15 minutes to the Bellarine and 10km to Geelong CBD.
IT IS A MUST TO INSPECT!
FEATURES
Own title on 240m2 approx
$330pw rent approx
Fujitsu Heat/Cool Split System
Updated throughout
Secure front and back courtyards
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 1/62 Burlington Crescent, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Luxury terrace living in an unrivalled position
Youll love:
Sitting directly behind the 1st tee of The Sands Torquay Golf Course with a view that stretches on for days this luxury terrace abode has a north-facing position that is unrivalled.
Enjoying the all-day sun on both levels, especially upstairs in the impressive kitchen & informal living/dining area that takes in the splendid view.
The fresh, modern & contemporary feel of the home with high ceilings, premium double blinds in all rooms & commercial grade heating & cooling throughout.
Spending cocktail hour on the huge undercover deck that makes the most of the sea breeze in summer & is also heated for winter!
Plus:
The kitchen is fabulous & has quality stone benchtops, a Smeg gas cooktop & oven, designer pendant lighting & a built-in fridge/freezer.
All 4 bedrooms have BIRs and are situated on the ground level including a large master with walk-through robes & a beautiful ensuite.
Theres also the stylish courtyard & tiled foyer that greets you upon entry, plus multiple storage options throughout, a remote single garage, additional parking space & much more.
Located only a few hundred metres away from Whites Beach & with the added benefit of a pool & gym membership across the road in the resort what more could you possibly want!
Insights: 5 Seaspray Place, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.
